title: [Large-Scale] Course Utilizing the 7Cs Framework for Online Learning Environment Design

context.additional_context: A short-term intensive course focused on designing online learning environments for non-degree-seeking adult learners. Includes personalized learning pathways via LMS and project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can design online learning activities utilizing the components of the 7Cs Framework (Conceptualize, Capture, Create, Communicate, Collaborate, Consider, Confirm).
Learners can plan personalized learning pathways in an LMS environment to achieve over 80% participation rates.
Learners can complete online learning designs applicable to real educational settings through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
